title: in no case shall a mezzanine floor be closed so as to make it liable to be converted into unventilated compartments
clause_text: in no case shall a mezzanine floor be closed so as to make it liable to be converted into unventilated compartments.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
